shortDescription.value: 2 Original Crunch Twisters with 2 Pieces Original Recipe Chicken and 2 Regular Chips.

longDescription.value: It’s the best thing since sliced bread. 2 Original Crunch Twisters® PLUS 2 pieces of Original Recipe PLUS 2 Regular Chips? Nah actually, that’s better than sliced bread.​
